name: Kenney Rotation
description:
Mouse to move and aim—Left-click to shoot.

Rotate weapons with W and E.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

I had other plans during the game jam, so I could only build this simple prototype.

I'll later update it and make it a complete experience.

To see more of my work, please, check dagongraphics.com.

Kind regards :)

Source code is available at: https://github.com/YvensFaos/KenneyRotation
